intro: Metalasia nitidula, commonly known as the smoothleaf metalasia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in grasslands and open woodlands, thriving in well-drained soils. Its leaves are smooth and lance-shaped, while the flowers are small and yellow, arranged in a compact cluster. Metalasia nitidula is often used in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
